title: Huevos Rancheros
directions: Heat up your tortillas. In a small sauce pan, warm up your black beans with the onion and cumin. Fry up your eggs or scramble your egg whites. Place the eggs on the flour tortilla. Top with the beans. Next, add all of your toppings-tomatoes, cheese, avocados, cilantro, and lime juice.
ingredients: 1 can of black beans (rinsed and drained, low sodium)
Shredded cheese (we used Colby and Pepperjack, I go light on the cheese, Josh loads it)
